  1. @rem ***********************************************************************
  2. @rem *                                                                     *
  3. @rem *                                 OCaml                               *
  4. @rem *                                                                     *
  5. @rem *                 David Allsopp, OCaml Labs, Cambridge.               *

  12. @rem *                                                                     *
  13. @rem ***********************************************************************

  15. @rem BE CAREFUL ALTERING THIS FILE TO ENSURE THAT ERRORS PROPAGATE
  16. @rem IF A COMMAND SHOULD FAIL IT PROBABLY NEEDS TO END WITH
  17. @rem   || exit /b 1
  18. @rem BASICALLY, DO THE TESTING IN BASH...

  20. @rem Do not call setlocal!
  21. @echo off

  23. chcp 65001 > nul
  24. ‌set BUILD_PREFIX=üê´—Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è
  25. ‌set OCAMLROOT=%PROGRAMFILES%\–ë–∞–∫—Ç—Ä—ñ–∞–Ωüê´

  27. if "%1" neq "install" goto %1
  28. setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
  29. echo AppVeyor Environment
  30. for %%K in (ACCOUNT_NAME ACS_DEPLOYMENT_UPGRADE_MODE API_URL
  31.             ARTIFACT_UPLOAD_TIMEOUT BUILD_FOLDER BUILD_ID BUILD_NUMBER
  32.             BUILD_VERSION BUILD_WORKER_IMAGE BUILD_WORKER_IMAGE
  33.             CACHE_ENTRY_UPLOAD_DOWNLOAD_TIMEOUT CACHE_SKIP_RESTORE
  34.             CACHE_SKIP_SAVE FILE_DOWNLOAD_TIMEOUT FORCED_BUILD
  35.             IGNORE_COMMIT_FILTERING_ON_TAG JOB_ID JOB_NAME JOB_NUMBER PROJECT_ID
  36.             PROJECT_NAME PROJECT_SLUG PULL_REQUEST_HEAD_COMMIT
  37.             PULL_REQUEST_HEAD_REPO_BRANCH PULL_REQUEST_HEAD_REPO_NAME
  38.             PULL_REQUEST_NUMBER PULL_REQUEST_TITLE RE_BUILD REPO_BRANCH
  39.             REPO_COMMIT_AUTHOR REPO_COMMIT_AUTHOR_EMAIL REPO_COMMIT
  40.             REPO_COMMIT_MESSAGE REPO_COMMIT_MESSAGE_EXTENDED
  41.             REPO_COMMIT_TIMESTAMP REPO_NAME REPO_PROVIDER REPO_SCM
  42.             REPOSITORY_SHALLOW_CLONE_TIMEOUT REPO_TAG_NAME REPO_TAG
  43.             RE_RUN_INCOMPLETE SAVE_CACHE_ON_ERROR SCHEDULED_BUILD
  44.             SKIP_FINALIZE_ON_EXIT APPVEYOR URL WAP_ARTIFACT_NAME
  45.             WAP_SKIP_ACLS) do echo APPVEYOR_%%K=!APPVEYOR_%%K!
  46. echo CI=%CI%
  47. echo CONFIGURATION=%CONFIGURATION%
  48. echo PLATFORM=%PLATFORM%
  49. endlocal

  51. goto install

  53. goto :EOF

  55. :CheckPackage
  56. "%CYG_ROOT%\bin\bash.exe" -lc "cygcheck -dc %1" | findstr %1 > nul
  57. if %ERRORLEVEL% equ 1 (
  58.   echo Cygwin package %1 will be installed
  59. ‌  set CYGWIN_INSTALL_PACKAGES=%CYGWIN_INSTALL_PACKAGES%,%1
  60. )
  61. goto :EOF

  63. :UpgradeCygwin
  64. if "%CYGWIN_INSTALL_PACKAGES%" neq "" "%CYG_ROOT%\setup-x86_64.exe" --quiet-mode --no-shortcuts --no-startmenu --no-desktop --only-site --root "%CYG_ROOT%" --site "%CYG_MIRROR%" --local-package-dir "%CYG_CACHE%" --packages %CYGWIN_INSTALL_PACKAGES:~1% > nul
  65. ‌for %%P in (%CYGWIN_COMMANDS%) do "%CYG_ROOT%\bin\%%P.exe" --version 2> nul > nul || set CYGWIN_UPGRADE_REQUIRED=1
  66. "%CYG_ROOT%\bin\bash.exe" -lc "cygcheck -dc %CYGWIN_PACKAGES%"
  67. if %CYGWIN_UPGRADE_REQUIRED% equ 1 (
  68.   echo Cygwin package upgrade required - please go and drink coffee
  69.   "%CYG_ROOT%\setup-x86_64.exe" --quiet-mode --no-shortcuts --no-startmenu --no-desktop --only-site --root "%CYG_ROOT%" --site "%CYG_MIRROR%" --local-package-dir "%CYG_CACHE%" --upgrade-also > nul
  70.   "%CYG_ROOT%\bin\bash.exe" -lc "cygcheck -dc %CYGWIN_PACKAGES%"
  71. )
  72. goto :EOF

  74. :install

  76. ‌if defined SDK set SDK=call %SDK%
  77. if not defined SDK (
  78. ‌  if "%PORT%" equ "msvc64" set SDK=call "C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0\VC\bin\amd64\vcvars64.bat"
  79. ‌  if "%PORT%" equ "msvc32" set SDK=call "C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0\VC\bin\vcvars32.bat"
  80. )
  81. %SDK%

  83. git worktree add "..\%BUILD_PREFIX%-%PORT%" -b appveyor-build-%PORT%

  85. cd "..\%BUILD_PREFIX%-%PORT%"
  86. if "%BOOTSTRAP_FLEXDLL%" equ "true" (
  87.   git submodule update --init flexdll
  88. )

  90. cd "%APPVEYOR_BUILD_FOLDER%"
  91. appveyor DownloadFile "https://github.com/alainfrisch/flexdll/archive/%FLEXDLL_VERSION%.tar.gz" -FileName "flexdll.tar.gz" || exit /b 1
  92. appveyor DownloadFile "https://github.com/alainfrisch/flexdll/releases/download/%FLEXDLL_VERSION%/flexdll-bin-%FLEXDLL_VERSION%.zip" -FileName "flexdll.zip" || exit /b 1
  93. rem flexdll.zip is processed here, rather than in appveyor_build.sh because the
  94. rem unzip command comes from MSYS2 (via Git for Windows) and it has to be
  95. rem invoked via cmd /c in a bash script which is weird(er).
  96. mkdir "%APPVEYOR_BUILD_FOLDER%\..\flexdll"
  97. move flexdll.zip "%APPVEYOR_BUILD_FOLDER%\..\flexdll"
  98. cd "%APPVEYOR_BUILD_FOLDER%\..\flexdll" && unzip -q flexdll.zip

  100. rem CYGWIN_PACKAGES is the list of required Cygwin packages (cygwin is included
  101. rem in the list just so that the Cygwin version is always displayed on the log).
  102. rem CYGWIN_COMMANDS is a corresponding command to run with --version to test
  103. rem whether the package works. This is used to verify whether the installation
  104. rem needs upgrading.
  105. ‌set CYGWIN_PACKAGES=cygwin make diffutils
  106. ‌set CYGWIN_COMMANDS=cygcheck make diff
  107. if "%PORT%" equ "mingw32" (
  108.   rem mingw64-i686-runtime does not need explicitly installing, but it's useful
  109.   rem to have the version reported.
  110. ‌  set CYGWIN_PACKAGES=%CYGWIN_PACKAGES% mingw64-i686-gcc-core mingw64-i686-runtime
  111. ‌  set CYGWIN_COMMANDS=%CYGWIN_COMMANDS% i686-w64-mingw32-gcc cygcheck
  112. )
  113. if "%PORT%" equ "mingw64" (
  114. ‌  set CYGWIN_PACKAGES=%CYGWIN_PACKAGES% mingw64-x86_64-gcc-core
  115. ‌  set CYGWIN_COMMANDS=%CYGWIN_COMMANDS% x86_64-w64-mingw32-gcc
  116. )
  117. if "%PORT%" equ "cygwin32" (
  118. ‌  set CYGWIN_PACKAGES=%CYGWIN_PACKAGES% cygwin32-gcc-core flexdll
  119. ‌  set CYGWIN_COMMANDS=%CYGWIN_COMMANDS% i686-pc-cygwin-gcc flexlink
  120. )
  121. if "%PORT%" equ "cygwin64" (
  122. ‌  set CYGWIN_PACKAGES=%CYGWIN_PACKAGES% gcc-core flexdll
  123. ‌  set CYGWIN_COMMANDS=%CYGWIN_COMMANDS% x86_64-pc-cygwin-gcc flexlink
  124. )
  125. ‌if "%PORT:~0,6%%BOOTSTRAP_FLEXDLL%" equ "cygwinfalse" set CYGWIN_PACKAGES=%CYGWIN_PACKAGES% flexdll

  127. ‌set CYGWIN_INSTALL_PACKAGES=
  128. ‌set CYGWIN_UPGRADE_REQUIRED=%FORCE_CYGWIN_UPGRADE%

  130. for %%P in (%CYGWIN_PACKAGES%) do call :CheckPackage %%P
  131. call :UpgradeCygwin

  133. "%CYG_ROOT%\bin\bash.exe" -lc "$APPVEYOR_BUILD_FOLDER/tools/ci/appveyor/appveyor_build.sh install" || exit /b 1

  135. goto :EOF

  137. :build
  138. "%CYG_ROOT%\bin\bash.exe" -lc "$APPVEYOR_BUILD_FOLDER/tools/ci/appveyor/appveyor_build.sh" || exit /b 1
  139. goto :EOF

  141. :test
  142. rem No tests run in the "C" build mode
  143. if "%BUILD_MODE%" equ "C" goto :EOF
  144. rem Add a C# compiler in PATH for the testsuite for mingw
  145. if "%PORT%" equ "mingw64" call "C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0\VC\bin\amd64\vcvars64.bat"
  146. if "%PORT%" equ "mingw32" call "C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0\VC\bin\vcvars32.bat"
  147. "%CYG_ROOT%\bin\bash.exe" -lc "$APPVEYOR_BUILD_FOLDER/tools/ci/appveyor/appveyor_build.sh test" || exit /b 1
  148. goto :EOF
